channel.title: Vanity Pk | 317 | Pking & Skilling | Flawless switching for hybridding |
channel.description:
[center]www.vanitypk.com/forums Forums www.vanitypk.com/webclient Play Now http://vanitypk.com/webclient/client.jar Download Client www.youtube.com/user/VanityPk Youtube
ALL PICTURES WILL BE TOWARDS BOTTOM OF THE THREAD.
[b]Vanity Pk is hosted with a VPS meaning 99.9% up time guaranteed! . WE HAVE HUGE PLANS FOR THE SERVER. WE ARE AND WE WILL CONTINUE TO UPDATE REGULARLY.[/b]
[b][size=10pt]Combat: PvP and PvM[/size][/b] Perfect item switching making for the perfect hybridding experience. Even the word Flawless doesn't describe how amazing the combat is. Just about perfect combat forumulas! 100% hitmarks and critical hits. We have working curse prayers with accurate effects for soul split etc! Random PvP artifact drops when in wildy to turn in for GP Points at mandrith. All PvP armors fully functional and available to everyone via PVM. Dragon claws available to everyone via PVM. Many monsters to fight such as frost dragons, bork, ice strykewyrms and so much more!
[b][size=10pt]Skilling:[/size][/b] All skills working with some custom skilling zones! MAX cape is available for those who decide they are up for the challenge of getting all non combat skills to 99.
[b][size=10pt]Points systems[/size][/b] We have a custom slayer system that gives points after each task to turn in for all sorts of rewards from slayer helm to goliath gloves, steadfast boots and much more. We have a custom TzHaar point that you get once you kill jad. As there is only one wave for jad, you have to kill him 4 times (4 points) for firecape or 15 times for kiln cape. An awesome Pk point system with an amazing Pk point shop We also have custom voting and donor points.
[b][size=10pt]Donator benefits:[/size][/b] Custom donor zone with exclusive benefits. Multiple donor ranks. Exclusive donor shop.
[size=10pt][b]Other:[/b][/size] Here at Vanity Pk we also have a custom Lottery system that each player can put 2 million GP in 5 times. Once the pot hits 250m a winner is randomly selected. Working dicing system! Working clan chat system! TONS of custom shops Working Skillcape emotes [img]http://i.imgur.com/HgdIj.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/Fb2sL.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/WgWex.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/uqAnB.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/emnBK.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/bHZHq.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/Ory0x.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/evKrR.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/YRpEa.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/jpesz.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/GKTP4.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/UNayK.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/WwXOx.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/Tgzkj.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/l5oAE.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/3OyOf.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/6vRW9.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/nFKWZ.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/Yquvc.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/bAkH5.png[/img][/center]

item.title: Vanity Pk | 317 | Pking & Skilling | Flawless switching for hybridding |
item.dc:creator: @Perplexity Perplexity
item.description:
@Perplexity wrote:

Well, there are things to do for everyone. Pking, skilling, pvm, dicing, and just so much more. Maybe a little constructive criticism on what could be added?

Read full topic
